page.title: 01MARTIN DALES & WOODHALL SPA
page.content:
{MARTIN DALES & WOODHALL SPA}
The M.Dales,Kirkstead and W.Spa area is one of a mainly agricultural nature.The river Witham,its embankment recently reinforced,bisects the area and is the venue for anglers. The drained fenland of Martin Dales supports an intense agricultural regime where crops are grown.A small community clusters around the bridge and small farms dot the area.Pub and Church hall are the only amenities. Kirkstead is ill- defined and recently lost its status as a separate parish, being now part of Woodhall Spa.It has Church,Chapel,pub and ancient ruin & P.O..{Woodhall Spa}is the centre of attraction for all local residents and tourists.In addition to its shops and services there are annual events e.g. an agricultural show and a marathon.
